body:
Despite the patch disabling installation of rules, meson's setup stage looks up the udev package to get `/lib/udev/rules.d`, but as spack has no `systemd/udev` package, it would fail to build.

Fix such builds by passing `-Dudevrulesdir` and bump version to 3.10.5
title: libfuse: Fix build when meson doesn't get host's udev pkg
